item.title: Riot Blockchain Mined a Total of 484 Bitcoins in July
item.description: On August 5th, Riot Platforms presented its July 2025 Operations Report. The figures indicate that the company mined a total of 484 bitcoins in July. This represents an 8% increase compared to the previous month and a 31% growth year-on-year.During this period, the company sold 475 bitcoins at an average price of $115,411, resulting in a net revenue of $54.8 million. Regarding infrastructure, the company's total deployed hash rate remained at 35.5 EH/s, while the average operational hash rate was 30.2 EH/s. By participating in a grid demand response program, the company received a $13.9 million electricity subsidy, reducing the overall electricity cost to $0.028 per kilowatt-hour.

item.title: White House Crypto Report Suggests Avoiding Double Taxation, Bitcoin Miners to Be Taxed Only Upon Sale
item.description: On August 5th, the Digital Asset Work Group of the U.S. White House suggested in a 168-page cryptocurrency report that the IRS clarify the tax timing of Bitcoin mining income. It is possible to change it to be taxed at the time of sale in order to avoid double taxation of "mining income tax + capital gains on sale."BitFuFu CEO Leo Lu stated that this action could substantially reduce the tax burden of miners and promote the mainstream adoption of Bitcoin. Congress has already witnessed bills such as H.R. 8149 proposing similar tax deferral schemes.

item.title: On-chain Transaction Engine Decibel Launches on Aptos, Reshaping Decentralized Market Infrastructure
item.description: On August 5th, the new decentralized trading engine, Decibel, which is supported by Aptos Labs and the Decibel Foundation, was officially launched today. The platform is designed to offer a neutral and composable core infrastructure for the global on-chain market. It integrates spot trading, perpetual contracts, and yield strategies and will serve as the execution layer within the Aptos financial ecosystem.As the demand for decentralized finance continues to rise, the market still heavily depends on fragmented platforms and third-party exchanges, resulting in the dispersion of liquidity and limited composability. By leveraging the Aptos blockchain, Decibel supports multi-collateral cross-margin accounts, a self-custody architecture, and programmable incentive mechanisms. This provides traders, developers, and institutions with unified liquidity management, direct order flow, and real-time data access, enhancing the efficiency of fund circulation and the trading execution experience.

item.title: BounceBit introduces the Franklin Dupton Tokenized Fund for its Treasury Bond Yield Strategy
item.description: On August 5th, the cryptocurrency infrastructure platform BounceBit is set to introduce Franklin Templeton's Tokenized Money Market Fund into its structured income platform BB Prime. By combining the US Treasury yield with cryptocurrency funds and a basis arbitrage strategy, an innovative product of CeDeFi (Centralized and Decentralized Finance integration) is created.This tokenized fund belongs to the BENJI product series and will serve as collateral and settlement tool in the investment strategy. Through this means, investors can not only obtain the underlying Treasury yield but also overlay other sources of income. Franklin Templeton is one of the earliest traditional asset management institutions to issue tokenized funds on public chains. As early as 2021, it launched the first tokenized US money market fund BENJI. item.title: Binance Alpha PROVE Airdrop Threshold: At least 241 Points in the first stage
item.description: August 5th, Binance Alpha has taken the lead in listing Succinct (token symbol: PROVE). The trading on Alpha is scheduled to officially commence on August 5, 2025, at 15:00 (UTC). Eligible users can, within 24 hours after the start of trading, access the Binance Alpha event page to claim 100 PROVE airdropped tokens by using Alpha Points. The Binance Alpha airdrop will be carried out in two phases: In the first phase (the first 18 hours), users with at least 241 Alpha Points can claim the airdrop; in the second phase (the last 6 hours), users with at least 200 Alpha Points can participate in the airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis. If the rewards are not all distributed, the hourly points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points. It should be noted that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Alpha Points. item.title: Indonesia is currently exploring the feasibility of adopting Bitcoin as a national reserve asset.
item.description: On August 5th, as reported by BitcoinMagazine, the vice president's office in Indonesia has extended an invitation to Bitcoin supporters to engage in discussions regarding the feasibility of adopting Bitcoin as a national reserve asset.

item.title: Trump: May Not Run for US President Again
item.description: On August 5th, during a live interview on CNBC's "Squawk Box", President Trump of the United States stated that he might not run for the presidency again. (FX168)

item.title: MEI Pharma Increases LTC Holdings with an Average Price of $107.58 to 929,548 Coins
item.description: On August 5th, MEI Pharma, Inc. (NASDAQ: MEIP) announced today that it had acquired 929,548 Litecoins (LTC) at an average price of $107.58 per coin, thus successfully commencing a significant institutional treasury strategy.As of August 4, 2025, the total value of this LTC treasury amounts to approximately $110.4 million. MEI has also become the first U.S. public company to hold Litecoin as a primary reserve asset, implementing a new strategy based on digital asset infrastructure and long-term capital innovation.This strategic move was developed through the collaboration between MEI and GSR and was executed under the guidance of Litecoin founder and MEI board member, Charlie Lee. This marks the start of MEI's larger-scale institutional treasury plan, aiming to leverage Litecoin's scalability and reliability as a long-term store of value and operating capital asset.

item.title: Trump: Will Drastically Increase Tariffs on India in the Next 24 Hours
item.description: On August 5th, during a live interview on CNBC's "Squawk Box", President Trump of the United States stated that India is the country with the highest tariffs and that he will significantly increase tariffs on India within the next 24 hours. India is not a good trading partner, and the disagreement with India lies in its high tariffs. (FX168)
